title: Online Maintenance Requests, New Kitchen Appliance Package
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 59', 'OR Text', '59', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1083 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Creekside Vista values your safety!', 'The community has implemented social distancing practices due to COVID-19.', 'Meet us virtually or by appointment for a socially distanced outside meeting!', 'Masks are required!', 'Features:', 'Hardwood-style Flooring, Private Balconies, Modern Styles, New Kitchen Appliance Package', 'Community Amenities:', 'New Online Services, Sundeck, Cyber Cafe, Online Maintenance Requests, Newly Renovated Homes, Play Park, Resort-Style Swimming Pool, Clothes Care Center, Leash-Free Dog Park, Convenient Online Payments, Fitness Studio, New Pool Lounge Area (Coming Soon)', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Max Weight of Pets: 50', 'Pet Fee: $300', 'Pet Monthly Rent Min/Max: $20 - $40', 'Other Pets Allowed: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 pet fee (non-refundable) per pet.', 'Pet rent is $20 per month, per pet.', 'There is a weight limit of 50 pounds per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please call our leasing office for our pet policy.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'VPwrE2K3u']
